name: Jetpack: Episode One
description:
Jetpack 2019 is the first episode of the jetpack 1993 remake. Get to the dungeon and find all the emerald of the rooms to get open the door of the next level. Only you have a jetpack to fly in the levels, you can get some power ups to jump more and run speedly. Its a plage of enemies, try to avoid them!

Controls:

  • Key Arrows: Move around, and use.
  • X: Jetpack!
  • Esc: Suicide, Quit
  • F5: Load Game
  • F6: Save Game
